Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game.

    • insert

      public void insert(Tile[] t, int column) throws NoTileException, ColumnOutOfBoundsException, IllegalColumnInsertionException
      Inserts the specified Tiles into the player's shelf column.
      Parameters:
      t - the array of Tile to insert
      column - the column index
      Throws:
      NoTileException - if no tile is provided
      ColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the column index is out of bounds
      IllegalColumnInsertionException - if the column insertion is illegal

    • checkPrivateGoal

      public boolean checkPrivateGoal() throws MissingShelfException, ColumnOutOfBoundsException
      Checks if the player's private goal is satisfied and updates the score accordingly.
      Returns:
      true if the private goal is correct, false otherwise
      Throws:
      MissingShelfException - if the shelf is missing
      ColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the column index is out of bounds
